Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 46th overall pick, by Minnesota in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2019, off John Elia (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2019, off Robert Hurst (WAS)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2019, hitting .550 with 0 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2020, hitting .524 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...

Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2021, hitting .476 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
